entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to tell if a Type is "awaitable" in native AOT / trimmed apps #103258
  • TE Fortunes regression on Windows #103256
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'cond == test' during 'Optimize post-layout' #103252
  • is there a way to not show native AOT warnings for statically inaccessible code during build? #103250
  • Unable to build project referencing latest .NET 9 Preview 6 Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #103249
  • Assertion in BigIntegerCalculator #103247
  • [browser][ST] Wasm tests timeout #103246
  • [API Proposal]: new ActivitySource.CreateActivity overload #103245
  • Support LDAPS ( TLS ) in System.DirectoryServices.Protocols ON Linux #103243
  • Minor race condition in HttpHeaders parsing #103238
    Future
  • Attaching an interop debugger to an x64 .Net on ARM64 fails to intiailize debugging #103235
    Future
  • [NativeAOT/linux-arm32] long and double thread statics are not 8-byte aligned #103234
  • Type.GetType(string) can't find type if assembly loaded using AssemblyLoadContext #103222
  • Unable to retrieve MethodInfo for delegates to certain default interface methods #103219
    Future
  • StackTrace APIs don't work for unreasonably large/negative skipFrames values #103218
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Allow Hook for Custom Resource Deserialization (BinaryFormatter) #101301
    9.0.0
  • Remove BinaryFormatter usage from System.Resources.Extensions #39292
    9.0.0
  • App throws TypeLoadException when published trimmed but works fine when published native AOT (no trim warnings) #102796
    9.0.0
  • coreCLR fails to build on Windows arm64 machine #103175
  • Regarding Memory Leak Check in Android Platform with dotnet-gcdump #101847
  • Suppress Interop/SuppressGCTransition/SuppressGCTransitionNegativeTest/SuppressGCTransitionNegativeTest.cmd for JITStress #93533
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #64049
    Future
  • HttpHeaders TryParse can throw #102584
    9.0.0
  • SG unit tests are incredibly slow when run in Debug because they run on top of a Debug CoreCLR #103227

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Http 1.1's read-ahead task management #103257
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Move the working BinaryFormatter implementation to a NuGet package #103255
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #103254
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.x
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #103253
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.x
  • Fix Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #103251
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Block System.Numerics.Tensors tests on native AOT #103248
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Changed TensorSpan and ReadOnlyTensorSpan layout for better performance. #103244
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Cleanup some handling around Avx10v1 #103241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Dispose XmlReader in CreateRuntimeRootDescriptorFile #103239
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Dispose XMLReader after using in Xml/Utils.cs #103236
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [android] Fix build withe newer NDK #103233
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Make System.Formats.Nrbf public #103232
    area-System.Security, binary-serialization
  • [android] Don't include `JNI_OnLoad` in `libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.Android.a` #103231
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [CI][aot] Do not overwrite `scenarios` argument if they were passed #103229
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add support for Sve.DuplicateSelectedScalarToVector() #103228
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [HybridGlobalization] Convert narrow no-break spaces to spaces #103226
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-browser
  • [browser] Increase timeout for System.Memory.Tests and System.Private.Xml.Tests #103221
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add new DiagnosticMethodInfo public API #103220
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #102346
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #102397
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64 when file offset is >4GB #103006
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression
  • Run System.Diagnostics.StackTrace tests with NAOT #103151
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ILLink: Sweep .override for interface method if the .interfaceImpl is removed #102857
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0] [mono][interp] Fix type of args when inlining method #102801
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.x
  • TryAddWithoutValidation for multiple values could be more efficient #102845
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Remove cached cgroup values (#102971) #103166
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 8.0.7
  • Fix build breaks in CoreCLR interpreter #103240
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix sending ICMP echo request when host is unreachable #103158
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [workload] Use the same naming as net9 workload #103049
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Delete dead code in winwrap.h #103193
    area-VM-coreclr
  • refactor: rename COMPlus classes to make a clear distinction with COM interop #102922
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix a few small leaks by properly freeing the result of g_strsplit #103189
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • [Release/8.0] Fix handling exceptions on shutdown #101915
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.7
  • Fix WhiteSpace validation in HttpHeaders #102693
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Chrome bump reviewers update #103230
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Convert ReRegisterForFinalize to QCALL #103211
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump Windows SDK version in .vsconfig #103217
    needs-area-label
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Optimize relocation counting in DehydratedDataNode.GetData #103202
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #103076
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2470465 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Use LTO for linux as well #103058
    needs-area-label
  • [Testing] CET pipeline #103179
  • Don't trim ShouldSerializeXXX and ResetXXX members that may be called with reflection #102780
    area-System.Data, 9.0.0
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 5 #103188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • [mono] Remove some domain stuff from the debugger #103186
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix `LoggerProviderDebugView.CalculateEnabledLogLevel` when the level is `None` #103209
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • ARM64-SVE: gathervector #103159
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Introduce IBufferedLogRecord #103138
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Add basic support for folding and normalizing hwintrinsic trees in morph #103143
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move the thread alloc context off of Thread in CoreCLR and NativeAOT #103055
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Instrumentation #100294
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-GC-mono
  • [release/8.0][Apple] Use NSLocale.preferredLanguages on for default locale name #102748
    area-System.Globalization, os-mac-os-x
  • Add more ZipArchive tests to confirm the Zip64 fix does not affect reading zip files generatd with the old bug #103152
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • field sequences for boxes #103185
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert remaining array FCalls to managed #102739
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid long busy-waiting between hijack retries. #103212
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Cleanup some FEATURE_... ifdefs in the GC #103200
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Support IAlternateEqualityComparer with FrozenDictionary/Set #103191
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 125.0.6422.141, windows: 126.0.6478.36 #103204
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • [NativeAOT] Enable `-dead_strip` linker optimization by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • Micro-optimize type check in GVMDependenciesNode.SearchDynamicDependencies #103199
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Adding support for open generic types in attributes #103213
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] [Question]: Should GCPointerMap have a provision for adding optional fields to GCStaticEETypeNode #2606

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • GenerateDepsFile doesn't include file or assembly version for Project references #12301
  • After installing .NET SDK 9.0 Preview 5, Creating 6.0/8.0 Blazor WASM requires July Servicing (8.0.7/6.0.32) feeds. #41432

Updated

  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: The "RestoreTask" task returned false but did not log an error #41477
  • VMR Unified Linux Build Failing #41030
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Info produced by `dotnet -?` about `dotnet help` is inaccurate. It says the command "Show command line help" rather than show online documentation in browser #41173

PullRequests

Created

  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fix compressed endpoint headers #41511
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Dispose FileStream after reading it and calculating Fingerprint & Integrity #41508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Merged

  • Include version in deps.json #38087
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disable CET compatibility setting on apphost when `CetCompat` property is set to `false` #41483
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Blazor] Ensure development manifest resolves tokens #41498
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add test #40548
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Revert TestPackage creation changes #41451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not go beyond the root when searching for a previously installed tool Fixes #40655 #40800
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Respect DebugSymbols=false Fixes #41364 #41384
    Review for breaking changes, untriaged, breaking-change, Area-NetSDK, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Specify a version of cmake in global.json #41476
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete src/SourceBuild/patches/roslyn/0001-ambiguous-call-site.patch #41089
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Keep ref struct interfaces behind preview flag #73923
    17.12
  • Autoformatting messes up indentation when starting a new line #73921
  • Proposal: flow attributes on parameters and type parameters to compiler-generated code #73920
  • `allows ref struct` generic can't be tested with `is` #73918
  • "Invert if" does not properly enclose an entire `#region`/`#endregion` #73917
    Backlog

Closed

  • Syntax coloring broken after updating to 17.10 #73862
    17.11
  • Proposal: Flow attributes on primary constructor parameters to generated fields #73899
  • VS 17.10.0 preview 4 shows warnings where no Error is. #73802

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve EnC log messages #73919
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #73915
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #73914
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add documentation to Values property in TypedConstant struct #73912
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Update TSAConfig.gdntsa #73924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix NFWs due to BG SG system in non C#/VB languages #73922
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Editorconfig options enumerator refactoring #73907
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in PENamespaceSymbol.GetMembers() #73794
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix build warnings observed locally #73593
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update MicrosoftDevDivOptimizationDataPowerShellVersion to 1.0.803 #73841
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #73916
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Avoid running generators when nothing has changed in a compilation tracker. #73897
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix wrong sorting in `AbstractSpellCheckingHandler.cs` #73913
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Throw when there is a syntax version mismatch in codelens #73902
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Global options #73808
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Delay reporting of pattern-based using diagnostics #73850
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable saving source texts to memory mapped files on non-Windows platforms #73628
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not report warnings because there is non-array params candidate among applicable dynamic candidates. #73829
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Update the code style package to build against Roslyn 4.8 #73900
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Follow up on added ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR: Using IAsyncEnumerable<T> and ChannelReader<T> with ValueTypes in native AOT #56179
    Backlog
  • Allow `ProducesProblem` on `RouteGroupBuilder` #56178
  • Aggregate multiple `Produces` for same status code but different content-types #56177
  • [Blazor] DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints unexpected exception #56176
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56174
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #56173
  • Add support for emitting ServerSentEvents from minimal APIs #56172
    9.0.0
  • MSB8020 error when building the repo #56171
  • Make `dotnet-user-jwts` support custom appsettings json file #56169
  • Blazor WebAssembly does not reload dotnet.js after .NET 8 update #56168
  • New and improved `kestrel.connection.duration` tags: `error.type` and protocol error #56164
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #56161
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #56160
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56159
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #56158
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56157
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56156
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #56155
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56154
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #56153
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56152
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56151
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56150
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #56149
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #56148
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #56147
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56146

Closed

  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56140
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #56136
  • Two-way binding issue for `Dictionary` values in InteractiveServer component #56145
    Backlog
  • Validation Model not compiling #55999
  • Blazor WebAssembly does not work after upgrade #55870
  • Function call from Blazor app gets stuck, works fine from Web API app #56020

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56181
    area-blazor
  • Bump braces from 3.0.2 to 3.0.3 #56180
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • Add support for reference-based schemas in OpenAPI document #56175
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24309.2 #56163
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Don't require latest runtime patch for Blazor DevServer #56123
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview6
  • Annotate SignalR client for native AOT #56079
    area-signalr, NativeAOT

Updated

  • Add codefixer to install OpenAPI package from extension methods #55963
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Fix urls in ProjectTemplates/README #55984
    area-mvc
  • Use IProblemDetailService in ValidationProblem #51464
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [Blazor] Consume fingerprinted assets in MVC and Blazor #56045
    area-blazor
  • Use JSON source generator in WebApplicationFactory #55595
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 9.0-preview6
  • ASP0022 - Fix false positive for groups without using intermediate variables #56116
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improve Kestrel connection metrics with error reasons #55565
    area-networking
  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enumerating contacts retrieved by GetAllAsync traps #22957
  • CollectionView is slow to initialize with complex ItemTemplate #22956
  • CollectionView Grouped Memory leak!! #22954
  • [Android]: Picker control's underline below the title doesn't respect forced light mode #22953
  • [Windows] `Controls.Sample.Sandbox` cannot be compiled with `PublishReadyToRun=True` #22952
  • In .NET 8 IOS platform getting exception while remove the child from the current layout. #22951
  • iOS: CollectionView Crashes when clearing ObservableCollection & adding data second time onwards #22949
  • Edit box outline is not visible for Ingredients, Recipe, Review edit field: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Usability #22947
    .NET 8 SR8
  • Editor and ScrollView problems in iOS #22946
  • {Binding .} doesn't work in release mode #22945
  • The target "StaticWebAssetsPrepareForRun" does not exist in the project. #22944
  • Voice over is not announcing the hint as press control option space begin editing for Ingredients, Recipe, Review edit fields: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_screeReader #22943
    .NET 8 SR8

Closed

  • Clicking on a button nested inside a Grid that hovers fixed above a CollectionView does not trigger any Events or Commands #22948
  • XAML Hot Reload breaks Prism Region application when running with Rider Debugger #22900
  • when navigate between pages (using Navigation.PushAsync and Shell.Current.GoToAsync("//Home") ) #22709
  • [Android] MissingMethodException when trying to get Handler for Maui View #21835
  • Error when running MyFirstMauiApp saying "Optimizing assemblies for size failed" in vscode. #22449
  • Using WebSockets Exception thrown: 'System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketException' in System.Private.CoreLib.dll #22221
  • Image File Size Increases Excessively Upon Saving on iOS Platform #22708
  • [iOS] Tooltip doesn't work #22658

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix PatchVersion to 70 #22955
  • Fix Release Versioning #22941

Updated

  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-dialogalert, stale
  • [Android] Action mode menu doesn't disappear when switch on another tab - fix #21231
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Android] Fix flyout behaviour switching exception #22453
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Android] Label.CharacterWrap wraps text too soon - fix #22728
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • `Size` and `SizeF` should not throw on `NaN` #22890
    area-core-platform
  • Fixes #22914 #22917
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • Cache SKPath to PathF.PlatformPath in Microsoft.Maui.Graphics.Skia #21169
    area-drawing
  • Use DialogFragment for Android modals #22869
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-dialogalert
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Enable Binding inteceptors source generator by default #22856
    area-core-platform
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • [Android] Navigation bar - left margin fix #20967

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Table-specific facet configuration with TPT results in wrong column names with SQLite #33955
  • Nested transactions throw an exception #33954
  • Non-generic ValueComparer and ValueConverter #33952
  • Sqlite: "target object/alias may not appear in FROM clause" in ExecuteUpdate #33947
    Backlog
  • Remove unneeded query root table when it's not needed in the query #33946
    Backlog
  • `builder.Entity<>().Property().Metadata.SetAfterSaveBehavior()` cannot be used with `.HasOne()` on the same prop #33945

Closed

  • Unexpected Client Evaluation when joining List and DbSet #33953
  • Missing checks for predicate when simplifying JSON primitive collections #33932
  • No relational provider - Entity annotation with default value based on DdContext property #33950
  • Hashset contains becomes a traditional IN statement instead of the new OpenJSON parameter #32365
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix UpdateExpression.VisitChildren to visit the setter column #33948
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33944
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Add missing check for predicate in primitive collection simplifications #33939
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.7
  • Implement translation of HashSet<T> (and ICollection<T> in general) to OPENJSON query #33920

Updated

  • Remove optimization of `NOT(a != b)` #33943
